Ai assist: Tooltip displayed when hovering over the CKEditor 5 icon, providing information about AI assistance.
Type / to request AI content: Hint suggesting users utilize AI for documenting or content creation.
Browser does not support readable stream: Appears when the Browser does not support readable streams.
Oops! Something went wrong while process: Indicates a failure when processing the provided prompt.
An error occurred while handling the AI': Indicates an error when unable to parse the AI response stream.
We couldn't connect to the AI. Please ch: Indicates a failure during a network call.
Unsupported language code: Appears when an unsupported language code is provided.
